name: Expelemalum (rmonthil)
description:
This project originated from the Godot Wild Jam 54 with theme "Curse". Pretty satisfied with how the game ended up, we decided to continue the development to end polishing it up and add more content to the game. The original jam-version of the game is still available on itch.io.

Roadmap
  • Update of the crowd simulation system
  • Improve overall polish, animations and more
  • Add much more content with several levels, more villagers and bosses
  • World lore and storytelling
  • Achievements and level-specific challenges
  • Local multiplayer mode
Content Warning

Reference to death and fictive religion.

Credits

Coding,  Art,  Audio,  Design: Nathan Bernard, Remi Monthiller and Samuel Terras-Viola

Sounds:

Church bell sound: sinewave1kHz from freesound

  • Bacon crackling sound: TheAcidRomance from freesound

Font: Avara by Raphaël Bastide, weiweihuanghuang, Lucas Le Bihan from fontlibrary

Teaser music: Medieval_winter by TEKNOAXE
